short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helpful developer tools to increase the productivity and efficiency of tasks for Web Developers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhanced DevTools, a Chrome Extension created to help Web Developers test faster and run custom functions on the front end.

These tools allow you to filter single or multiple keywords within a link on a page (by looking at the href). You can also write custom javascript which can run on each page for testing your front end. Extremely useful when you want to detect if certain element exists on a current page.
 
I hope this tool can enhance your development and increase your productivity.

Please note this is an early release and is likely to have some bugs.
Feel free to report any bugs or feature suggestions.
